title: Big problem in alpha client
body:
I've been playing regularly trying to get past the annoying glitch on fullscreen that I've had to adjust my entire desktop layout for, but all of the sudden randomly my ping goes out the roof 100-300+ and I disconnected from a game for the first time today. Usually lands around 45, not only that but after my recent games it greys out the play button and will not allow me to play or join invites. I've tried waiting it out, repatching / repairing my client and everything but it still has the same problem. Restarted my router twice already with still no result. Happened out of nowhere, was wondering if maybe anyone else was having similar problems or any possible way to fix it?
Client already high focus status on windows 8 for ping fix, also I ipconfig /flushdns sometimes when it gets bad which is usually in the day but at nights I NEVER have this problem. Problem currently started a few hours ago while everyone was off the internet. Any advice would be helpful, thanks!
(As I've written this play button is still grayed out.. tried playing a ranked game after waiting 15 minutes for it to come back and the ping was an issue, they remade, gonna put off playing till somethings done / i can fix it)

replies.body:
We most often see these sorts of issues with latency (ping) when there are issues on the local network and on the path to the servers. I strongly recommend going through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are configured properly for League.

Should you still encounter issues with this after taking those steps, please let me know.
